title: Augusta County: D. V. Gilkeson to Gilkeson's brother (probably Hugh Gilkeson), September 27, 1867
summary: Gilkeson delivers news about the crops and discusses the season's fruit. He provides updates about the children and mentions that several local women believe the boy Willie looks like his grandfather. Gilkeson also writes about an upcoming church election.
keywords: Agriculture, Family, Home Front, Women, American Civil War
